comment: Dr. Yow changed my world.  I am ready for the great beyond! :)
Dr. Yow is the greatest teacher! Everyone should take her class.
Definitely  would take again! she is an amazing teacher and is super helpful. She loves to help students with their essays and gives really good feedback. Also, her lectures are really interesting!

I didn't realize the class would revolve around race and education when I started but Professor Yow made the class really interesting and gave me an insight on a subject I really knew nothing about. I would recommend her.

While I do think she is biased and pretty extreme, she is able to entertain the ideas and opinions that are contrary.  She graded me fairly and let me speak my mind.  She is great, but don't be afraid to speak, challenge her.  She is also sharp, have your ducks in a row if you are going to challenge her.

Dr. Yow is the perfect teacher. She cares about her students and the course material, and she works very hard to help the students learn.  She's not pedantic. She provides a balanced and objective perspective of the course material.  She is all about helping her students learn and improve. When she corrects a student she helps them truly develop.

This class seemed like a ton of work when it started, but turned out to be one of the most enjoyable classes I've taken. You may have to remind her its an 1100 level class and we don't all read these books for fun, but overall she's a great professor, and I cant recommend this class enough.

I thought I wouldn't like her or this class at first, but I was wrong! She's very understanding- shes a new teacher so she relies on our feedback. Lowered the coursework once we told her it was too much for a gen ed course. Go to class, participate in the discussions, and you will be fine! I definitely recommend her!!
LOVE HER!!!!  She's super smart, funny, and the class discussions and reading are very interesting. Not a dull moment!  Go to class,  do the readings, and you'll be fine.
